title: 8.1 Master Challenge 3
question:
Ms.Nora has a pixel table of a grayscale image, as shown below


The value 0 means black pixel.
The value 255 means white pixel.

Write a Java program to accomplish the following tasks:
Task 1: She wants to know the number of black and white pixels.
Task 2: She wants to know the count of white pixels that have a black pixel above them.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
